input.sentences: this was our hotel room we stayed in on the trip .
flossing is essential for clean healthy teeth .
the furnishings had a upscale | modern look to them .
i do n't know what it says but i 'm not touching whatever it is .
it was cold outside | so we had to get all bundled up | but it was fun times .
output.sentences: Today she took a long trip, and stayed at a hotel.
Flossing your teeth is still important when you are traveling.
She really liked the upscale modern furnishings in her hotel room.
She looked at the sign, but wasn't sure what it said, so she was careful when touching it.
She will always remember her fun times on her trip, and how cold she was!
